评论详情: It is a good size and the print was good. I wish it was a little heavier.
This penguin blanket is so comfy.beautiful gift for a beautiful  person.perfact gift for special occasion. Recommend
My wife loved this present so much she cried and gave me a lot of kisses. Not expensive and still one of the best presents I got her
So very soft. I bought my husband one as a gift now I'm going to buy myself one!!

I bought this blanket for my boyfriend, we’re long distance so I always pick cute little gifts to send him and this time was a win!  It’s not a super large blanket, it’s sized to be a throw blanket, but the quality is top knotch! The print quality is exactly where it needs to be, there’s no blurry parts of the images. The colors are vibrant and from far away you can see exactly what the blanket says!  It’s a super cute and comfy blanket, and will definitely be keeping him warm for the winter with a little reminder that I love him lol!  Definitely got my moneys worth with this one! Awesome quality.
Purchased this for my wife. She absolutely loved it. It is soft and light enough to wear on her shoulders around the house.

I ordered this as a random surprise gift for my girlfriend, and she loved it! The blanket is a nice standard fleece and can be washed and dried regularly. The message and image look just like the pictures, and it was definitely worth the money.

This blanket not only has an adorable message but it is, itself, adorable! Great quality! It is soft and large enough to cover an adult! It is thin so I don't see it helping with warmth but you could still cover up with it. I gave it to my boyfriend for our anniversary and a day later he proposed to me quoting the blanket saying, on one knee, "Will you be MY penguin?" How could anyone say no to that?!? Now, we have it hanging on the wall!
This was a gift and myy daughter loved it.
It is so cute and special
I love how soft it is but don’t like how small it is
The wife loved it!  Need I say more.

This was a birthday gift for my wife that is now "Her" couch blanket.  My kids try to steal it because it is super soft.  And I enjoy watching the playful fighting over who gets it with a small bowl of popcorn.  Recommend both the blanket and the popcorn.
Got for the novelty, it not perfect but for a cute gift for my husband - it’s great, cute throw that means something
This was the perfect gift for my 9th anniversary.  She loved it!
Cozy
Love this throw
Great quality and you get your money’s worth for the value.
Cheaply made
I got this for my boyfriend. The only downside is that it comes vacuumed sealed, so if you really want the wrinkles out, I suggested putting it in the dryer for a little bit. Extremely soft!!!
Great size, very cute. Warm quality blanket. Light weight and does not fade with washing!
Quality was not good
He loved it will order more blankets from her.
Very cute and soft.
Perfect gift and very cozy.
It came fast and is exactly like the picture. However it is a little thin but is great for a light throw while on the couch.

Item came quickly and was surprised when it did for many reasons. Was expecting a different package . This item is soft and the size it says it is but . . . It’s very very thin for a blanket. It feels like if it was pulled on just right, it would rip its so thin. Maybe it’s just us but expected something a little heavier. Compare it to the a Dollar Store or 5 Below item. Not worth the money IMO. JS
This blanket is so cute and perfect gift for second wedding anniversary!
This is a good quality, soft blanket. Well worth the price. This is a great gift, and my wife loves hers.
This blanket is extremely soft, cozy and cute! I have not washed it yet but it seems like it'll wash up well without changing the softness.
My fiance and the pups snuggle under it in the AC lol...winter sb wonderful.

评论概述: Cute and Comfy, but NOT 50" x 60"
评论详情: Got this for me and my partner to snuggle on the couch with. It's also spurred an inside joke (calling each other our penguin). But it just isn't nearly the size that it says it is. If it were, we could both wrap ourselves around it, but we have to toss it length-wise across us like a 30"x40" throw blanket. I haven't a measuring tape but I believe that is the true dimensions.
Bought for my fiancee as an anniversary present and he thinks it's adorable. It's very soft and great for when you need a small blanket to keep your legs and feet warm.
Wife loves it. Very soft.
Gave this to my husband as a present for our anniversary and it came in quick. It’s super soft and unlike some things that take a few days to not smell it had no chemical smell to it
So perfect as an anniversary gift! My husband was so happy.
Cute, soft
Quite cute from what I could see. His gf loved it
Not thick but warm and super soft.  Would buy more from this brand.
Thin but it's not described as not thin so I guess thats fine.  Came way late, but that's an Amazon fail as per normal
As expected, bought as a gift that has not been given yet.
